alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 11:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Commissioner Creek at US 441 at McIntyre affecting Wilkinson County. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Commissioner Creek at US 441 at McIntyre. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs of the natural flood plain and woodlands along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 441 or Georgia Highway 29. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 13.3 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EDT Tuesday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
